LOAD_MODAL.TITLE: Load a Model
LOAD_MODAL.CONTENT: Paste your Aspect Model in the area below to load it.

SAMM_MIGRATION.AWAITING_STATUS: Please wait until all files are

MIGRATE_WORKSPACE_DIALOG.AWAITING_STATUS: Please wait until all files are migrated

MIGRATION_STATUS_DIALOG.TITLE: Migration Status
MIGRATION_STATUS_DIALOG.ERROR: SAMM Version upgrade to {{version}} finished, but {{fileCount}} had to be skipped. Please fix {{fileCountMessage}} first (in a text editor, contacting us, or in a previous version of the editor that supports the original SAMM version that has to be temporarily installed). See below:

WORKSPACE_MIGRATION_DIALOG.TITLE: Migrate Workspace to SAMM
WORKSPACE_MIGRATION_DIALOG.FILE_VERSION_WARNING: Your workspace has at least one file based on a SAMM version below
WORKSPACE_MIGRATION_DIALOG.MIGRATE_INSTRUCTION: Click the Migrate button to proceed with the migration.
WORKSPACE_MIGRATION_DIALOG.UPGRADE_EFFECT: If selected, a new major version of all migrated namespaces will be created to indicate the SAMM version upgrade. Otherwise the existing namespaces will be overwritten (previous content will remain in a backup).

SIDEBAR.MESSAGE: Files with a lower SAMM version have been found.

NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.ONLY_TWO_ELEMENTS_CONNECTION: Please select only two elements to connect them
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.CIRCULAR_CONNECTION_MESSAGE: Can not connect elements due to circular connection
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.ABSTRACT_PROPERTY_PARENT_REQUIREMENT: One of the Properties/Abstract Properties need to have as parent an Entity/Abstract Entity
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.PROPERTY_EXTENSION_CONFLICT: Can not extend a Property which already extends another element
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.MODEL_MINIMUM_ELEMENT_REQUIREMENT: For a valid model, at least one element needs to exist
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.INTERNAL_EXPORT_ERROR: Could not export package due to an internal error
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.SUMMARY_CLIPBOARD_FAILURE: Error on copying summary to clipboard
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.CHILD_FOR_PREDEFINED_ELEMENT_ERROR: A predefined element can't have a child
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.LOADING_ERROR: Error when loading Aspect Model. Reverting to previous Aspect Model
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.COPIED_TO_CLIPBOARD_MESSAGE: The Aspect Model has been copied to clipboard (as ttl code)
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.EXPORTING_TITLE_ERROR: Error while exporting the Aspect Model
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.PACKAGE_IMPORTED_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please retry to upload the namespaces
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.FILE_ADDED_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your file was added to the workspace successfully.
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.FILE_ADDED_ERROR_MESSAGE: We encountered an issue while adding the file to your workspace. Please attempt to add it again. If the issue continues, reach out to our support team for assistance.
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.VALIDATION_ERROR_MESSAGE: Unfortunately the validation could not be completed. Please retry or contact support
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.ASPECT_SAVED_SUCCESS: Aspect model was saved to the local folder
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.ASPECT_SAVED_ERROR: Error on saving the aspect model
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.ASPECT_MISSING_CONTENT: To start modelling, please create a new or load an existing model first. After that you can add new node types
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.LOAD_MODEL_INFO_MESSAGE: To view the file contents, please load a model first.
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.FALLBACK_TO_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_DESC_MESSAG: The specified language for {{subject}}'s description was not found in {{fileName}}. Proceeding with the default language settings.
NOTIFICATION_SERVICE.FALLBACK_TO_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_PREF_MESSAG: The specified language for {{subject}}'s preferred name was not found in {{fileName}}. Proceeding with the default language settings.

TOOLBAR.REMOVE_FILTER_MODE: Remove filter mode to find all elements
TOOLBAR.FILTER_WAIT: Please wait until the filtering is done
TOOLBAR.GENERATING_POSSIBLE: Generation is only possible for Aspect Models, not for files without Aspect.

DECLARE_NAME_DIALOG.TITLE: Declare name of Shared Model
DECLARE_NAME_DIALOG.INFO_CONTENT: You are about to remove the Aspect which will transform this Aspect Model into a Shared Model. Please choose a name for this Shared Model.
DECLARE_NAME_DIALOG.CHARACTERS_ERROR: Allowed characters: alphanumeric, space, dot(.), minus(-) and underscore(_)
DECLARE_NAME_DIALOG.EXIST_ERROR: This file already exists in your namespace

SELECT_LANGUAGE_TO_JSON_SCHEMA_DIALOG.TITLE: Select a language to generate JSON Schema

LOAD_MODEL_DIALOG.TITLE: Start modeling
LOAD_MODEL_DIALOG.INFO_CONTENT: An existing Aspect Model will be replaced with the new one. Any unsaved changes will be lost.
LOAD_MODEL_DIALOG.OPTIONS_MESSAGE: To start modeling you have three options:
LOAD_MODEL_DIALOG.FIRST_OPTION: start from a new model (see initial Aspect model code in the text area below)<
LOAD_MODEL_DIALOG.SECOND_OPTION: paste existing Aspect Model file (*.ttl) into the text area below
LOAD_MODEL_DIALOG.THIRD_OPTION: load Aspect Model file (*.ttl) by choosing 'Load from File' below.
LOAD_MODEL_DIALOG.MODIFY_MANUALLY_CONTENT: As an expert you may also modify the Aspect Model file manually.
LOAD_MODEL_DIALOG.TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER: Paste your Aspect Model here or load it from file.

EXPORT_NAMESPACE_DIALOG.TITLE: Export namespace(s) to package
EXPORT_NAMESPACE_DIALOG.INFO_CONTENT: Please select the file that you would like to export as an Aspect Model Package (zip). All the dependencies of that file will be included into the Aspect Model Package (zip).

CLIP_BUTTON.TOOLTIP: Copy the validation result to clipboard

NOTIFICATION_DIALOG.CONTENT: Please wait. Be aware that after 60 seconds a timeout will automatically cancel this operation
NOTIFICATION_DIALOG.WAIT_ACTION: Please wait until the action is finished!
NOTIFICATION_DIALOG.NO_ASPECT_TITLE: Load or create an Aspect Model before validating

HELP_DIALOG.INFO_CONTENT: The Aspect Model Editor is the visual editor for Aspect Models based on SAMM as part of the Eclipse Semantic Modeling Framework.
HELP_DIALOG.REGARD_USAGE_EDITOR: for help regarding the usage of the Aspect Model Editor.
HELP_DIALOG.REGARD_DIGITAL_TWIN_SYSTEM: for general help about the Digital Twin System and the Semantic Aspect Meta Model as part of the Digital Twin System.

WORKSPACE_SUMMARY.SELECT_TO_VALIDATE: Select an Aspect Model to see the validation result.

GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.TITLE: Generate OpenAPI specification
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.BASEURL: Base Url - the base URL for the Aspect API
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.INCLUDE_QUERY_API_TOOLTIP: Include the path for the Query Aspect API Endpoint in the OpenApi specification.
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.USE_SEMANTIC_VERSION_TOOLTIP: Use the full semantic version from the Aspect Model as the version for the Aspect API.
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.ACTIVATE_RESOURCE_PATH: If enabled, the resource path will be activated in the OpenAPI specification.
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.RESOURCE_PATH: Resource Path - The resource path for the Aspect API endpoints
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.RESOURCE_PATH_ERROR: Failed to generate Open Api Spec
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.UPLOAD_FILE_DESCRIPTION: For information on the options, please refer to the
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.UPLOAD_DRAG_AND_DROP_TEXT: Drag and drop files here or click the icon to upload
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.UPLOAD_FILE_REQUIRED: {{output}} file is required - a variable has been defined in the resource path.
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.ADD_OPEN_API_PUT_TOOLTIP: Include PUT in the OpenApi specification.
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.ADD_OPEN_API_PATCH_TOOLTIP: Include PATCH in the OpenApi specification.
GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.ADD_OPEN_API_POST_TOOLTIP: Include POST in the OpenApi specification.

GENERATE_ASYNCAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.TITLE: Generate AsyncAPI specification
GENERATE_ASYNCAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.APPLICATION_ID: Application ID - sets the application id, e.g. an identifying URL
GENERATE_ASYNCAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.CHANNEL_ADDRESS: Channel Address - sets the channel address (i.e., for MQTT, the topic's name)
GENERATE_ASYNCAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.CHANNEL_ADDRESS_ERROR: Channel address is pattern is not matching
GENERATE_ASYNCAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.USE_SEMANTIC_VERSION_TOOLTIP: Use the full semantic version from the Aspect Model as the version for the Aspect API.
GENERATE_ASYNCAPI_SPEC_DIALOG.WRITE_SEPARATE_FILES_TOOLTIP: Package each schema into individual files.

GENERATE_HANDLING.FAIL_GENERATE_OPENAPI_SPEC: Failed to generate Open Api specification
GENERATE_HANDLING.NO_ASPECT_TITLE: Load or create an Aspect Model before generating artefacts

SIDEBAR.DRAG_TO_RIGHT_TO_ADD: {{value}} - Drag to the right to add
SIDEBAR.THE_ROOT_OF_AVAILABLE_NAMESPACES: The root of all locally available namespaces
SIDEBAR.WORKSPACE_TIP: To see your current Model in the below list, save it to workspace.

EMPTY.SAVE_MESSAGE: To see your current Model in the below list, save it to workspace.
EMPTY.CALL_TO_ACTION: Currently the workspace doesn't have any files. Click the button bellow to import namespaces!

SETTINGS_DIALOG.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS_DIALOG.ERROR_MESSAGE: Please fix the errors before save the settings

CONFIGURATION.AUTO_VALIDATION_TOOLTIP: After completing a validation, after passing the waiting period the next auto-validation will be triggered.
CONFIGURATION.AUTO_FORMATTING_TOOLTIP: Auto format elements on the graph.
CONFIGURATION.DISPLAY_DISAMBIGUATION_LABEL_TOOLTIP: Displays labels on relationships that require disambiguation, e.g. Operation input/output, Characteristic Either left/right and Properties with notInPayload set.

NAMESPACES.NAME: Name
NAMESPACES.ASPECT_NAMESPACE_TOOLTIP: Please note that only the current Aspect Model in its current version will be moved to another namespace. References to other Aspect Models and/or versions will keep the original namespace.

ELEMENT_MODEL_DESCRIPTION.ASPECT: The root element of each Aspect Model
ELEMENT_MODEL_DESCRIPTION.CHARACTERISTIC: The meaning of a Property in the context of the Aspect
ELEMENT_MODEL_DESCRIPTION.ABSTRACT_ENTITY: The abstraction of a logical encapsulation of multiple values
ELEMENT_MODEL_DESCRIPTION.ENTITY: The logical encapsulation of multiple values
ELEMENT_MODEL_DESCRIPTION.UNIT: A definition of a physical unit
ELEMENT_MODEL_DESCRIPTION.CONSTRAINT: A limitation applied to a Characteristic
ELEMENT_MODEL_DESCRIPTION.OPERATION: An Operation represents an action that can be triggered on the Aspect
ELEMENT_MODEL_DESCRIPTION.EVENT: A definition of an Event supported by the Aspect

EDITOR_CANVAS.FITTING_PROGRESS: Fit the complete model on the current view

NAME.PLEASE_START_WITH_UPPER_CASE: Please start with an upper case character followed by letters/numerals.
NAME.PLEASE_START_WITH_A_LOWER_CASE: Please start with a lower case character followed by letters/numerals.
NAME.PLEASE_SELECT_DIFFERENT_NAME: Please select a different name as this one is already in use in the same namespace
NAME.PLEASE_SELECT_DIFFERENT_NAME_NAMESPACE: Please select a different name as this one is already in use in the same namespace
NAME.ALREADY_DEFINED_IN_SAME_NAMESPACE: Please select a different name as this one is already in use in the same namespace

UNIT.SELECT_DIFFERENT_NAME_TYPE: Please select a different name as this one is of different type
UNIT.SELECT_DIFFERENT_NAME_NAMESPACE: Please select a different name as this one is of different type in the same namespace

SEE_INPUT.TYPE_TO_SEARCH: Type to search or write an URN or URL

NOTIFICATION.EDIT_VIEW_UNAVAILABLE_MESSAGE: The element you`re trying to edit doesn`t exist. Please check if the element ID is correct or if it has been removed.

CREATE_ASPECT.TITLE: Create new Aspect
CREATE_ASPECT.ASPECT_CREATION_WARNING: You are about to create an Aspect which will transform this Shared Model into an Aspect Model.
CREATE_ASPECT.NAME_REPLACEMENT_NOTICE: The current name of the Model will be replaced by the name of the Aspect.

RELOAD_CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Current Aspect Model changed
RELOAD_CONFIRMATION.WORKSPACE_LOAD_NOTICE: has been loaded to a workspace.
RELOAD_CONFIRMATION.RELOAD_WARNING: Reloading will replace current Aspect Model with the version from a workspace, all unsaved changes will be lost. Reload?

NAMESPACE_CHANGE.TITLE: Update Model namespace
NAMESPACE_CHANGE.PHRASE1: The namespace for the model "{{originalModelName}}" has been updated.
NAMESPACE_CHANGE.PHRASE5: • Relocate "{{originalModelName}}" from the old namespace to the new namespace.
NAMESPACE_CHANGE.PHRASE6: • Refresh any Aspect models that are linked to "{{originalModelName}}" to reflect this change.
NAMESPACE_CHANGE.PHRASE7: Do you want to apply these changes now?

SAVE_BEFORE_LOAD.PHRASE2: Do you want to save the current Aspect Model in the workspace first?
SAVE_BEFORE_LOAD.TITLE: Save current Aspect Model

DELETE_FILE.PHRASE1: Are you sure you want to delete the Aspect Model "{{fileName}}" from its namespace?
DELETE_FILE.TITLE: Delete Aspect Model

NEW_WINDOW_ELEMENT.PHRASE1: You are about to open a new window with {{elementName}} highlighted.
NEW_WINDOW_ELEMENT.TITLE: Open element in other window?

LOADING_SCREEN_DIALOG.MODEL_LOADING_WAIT: Please wait until the model is loaded!
LOADING_SCREEN_DIALOG.FILTER_WAIT: Please wait until the filtering is done
LOADING_SCREEN_DIALOG.SAVING_TO_WORKSPACE_CONTENT: Please wait. The migration process for dependent models can take a while.
LOADING_SCREEN_DIALOG.ACTION_WAIT: Please wait until the filtering is done

TOOLTIPS.OUTDATED_FILE: This file is based on an older SAMM version ({{sammVersion}})
TOOLTIPS.ERRORED_FILE: This file has loaded with errors
TOOLTIPS.CURRENT_FILE: This file is currently opened in the current window
TOOLTIPS.LOCKED_FILE: This file is opened in other window
